definitions.body: :Nu 15:24 he-goat, buck (hairy one; NH id.);—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Le 4:24 +, cstr. [[שְׂעִיר]] Nu 7:16 +; pl. [[שְׂעִירִם]] Le 16:7, Le 16:8; cstr. [[שְׂעִירֵי]] v:Le 16:5, Nu 7:87;—he-goat, usu. [[עִזִּים]]([[־]])[[שְׂעִיר]] buck of goats (v. [[עֵז]] p. 777): Ge 37:31 (J), Ez Eze 43:22, Le 45:23, Le 4:23, Le 9:3, Le 23:19 + 20 t. Nu (all P); ´[[שְׂעִירֵי ע]]: Le 16:5, Nu 7:87 (P); ´[[שׂ]]: alone = he-goat Le 4:24 + 11 t. Le 16 (P); [[חַטָּאת]]([[הַ]])[[שְׂעִיר ]] he-goat for sin-offering Ez Eze 43:25, Le 9:15 + 9 t. Lv Nu; ´[[שְׂעִירֵי הַח]]: 2Ch 29:23; in Da 8:21 ´[[הַשּׂ]]: is prob. gloss to [[הַצָּפִיר]] (cf. Dr).
